meanings.definition: To punch harder or more effectively than someone else.
meanings.sent1: In the boxing match, Mike was outpunching his opponent with powerful blows.
meanings.sent2: She always manages to outpunch her fears and doubts to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent3: The superhero outpunching the villain made the audience cheer for justice.
meanings.sent4: His determination to outpunch any obstacles in his way led him to success.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of outpunching on the punching bag echoed in the gym.

meanings.definition: The act of punching harder or more effectively than someone else.
meanings.sent1: The outpunching in the final round secured his victory in the match.
meanings.sent2: Her outpunching was evident from the way her opponents stumbled back.
meanings.sent3: The outpunching contest at the fair drew a large crowd of spectators.
meanings.sent4: The outpunching of the heavyweight champion was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The outpunching power of the martial artist was unmatched in the tournament.
